skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: intelligence node
des:
Insuite by Intelligence Node gives competitive pricing & catalog benchmarking solutions with AI-powered tools. We help retailers with pricing automation, assortment intelligence, MAP compliance, global market data, and overall retail optimization. Insuite comprises of Incompetitor®, Inoptimizer®, and Infeed™.

Incompetitor® - Compare and analyze catalogs in your market, spots gaps trends, and opportunities, maximize revenue by adjusting prices and promotions, extract meaningful context from market data- all in real-time.

Inoptimizer® - Estimate SmartPrice with custom presets, get 360° product & pricing insights, track product history, and maximize margins on auto-pilot.

Infeed™ - Data that is accurate, insightful & intuitive. Merge your internal data with the world's largest market feed- unmatched in accuracy, intuitive & insightful, enriched with consumer data.

Insuite is powered by the world’s largest global retail product index, unmatched in accuracy, mapping 1 billion+ unique products across 130,000+ brands for more than 1400+ categories every day. With multilingual, machine learning capabilities, this product suite is the ultimate competitive tool for retail businesses of all sectors, scales, and geographies.

Our clients include category leaders like Walmart, Tesco, Jockey, Mobly, Landmark, Li&Fung +100 more brands, and retailers.
